TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CookieParameter extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter

summary.span: 将客户端 HTTP Cookie 的值绑定到参数对象。

span.span: Binds the value of a client-side HTTP cookie to a parameter object.

summary.span: 该参数可以在参数化的查询或命令中使用，以选择、筛选或更新数据。

span.span: The parameter can be used in a parameterized query or command to select, filter, or update data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用类将 作为 HTTP 请求的一部分传递的客户端 HTTP cookie 的值绑定到 ASP.NET 数据源控件所使用的参数。You can use the class to bind the value of a client-side HTTP cookie passed as part of an HTTP request to a parameter used by ASP.NET data source controls. 类提供 属性，该属性标识 要绑定到的对象的名称，以及从类继承的对象的名称 。The class provides the property, which identifies the name of the object to bind to, in addition to those inherited from the class. 每次调用方法时，类都将尝试绑定到已命名的 cookie 。The class attempts to bind to the named cookie every time the method is called. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果 指定了对象，但未随 HTTP 请求一起传递相应的 cookie，则将数据绑定到参数的控件可能会引发异常。Controls that bind data to the parameter might throw an exception if a object is specified, but no corresponding cookie is passed with the HTTP request. 同样，如果与传递 cookie，则它们可能不显示任何数据 `null` 。Similarly, they might display no data if the cookie is passed with `null`. 在适当的情况下，将属性设置为避免出现这种情况。Set the property to avoid these situations where appropriate. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 绑定到 HTTP cookie 的控件和对象在控件中显示 Northwind 商贸数据库中的数据 。The following code example demonstrates how to use a control and object bound to an HTTP cookie to display data from the Northwind Traders database in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.CookieParameter_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.CookieParameter_1/CS/cp1cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.CookieParameter_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.CookieParameter_1/VB/cp1vb.aspx#1)]

[!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.CookieParameter_2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.CookieParameter_2/CS/cookieparam2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.CookieParameter_2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.CookieParameter_2/VB/cookieparam2vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码隐藏模块与以前的 Web 窗体页一起使用。The following code-behind module is used with the previous Web Forms page. summary.span: 获取或设置参数绑定到的 HTTP Cookie 的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the HTTP cookie that the parameter binds to.

value.span: 一个字符串，该字符串标识参数绑定到的客户端 HTTP Cookie。

span.span: A string that identifies the client-side HTTP cookie that the parameter binds to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性标识 HTTP cookie，它由对象表示， 可通过当前 对象使用。The property identifies an HTTP cookie, which is represented by an object and is available through the current object. 如果 HTTP cookie 在当前对象中不可用 ，则 方法会将参数绑定到属性的值 （如果已设置）。If the HTTP cookie is not available in the current object, the method binds the parameter to the value of the property, if it is set. 如果 未设置该属性，则该 方法无法将参数绑定到值。If the property is not set, the method fails to bind the parameter to a value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式使用 控件和 绑定到 HTTP cookie 的对象在控件中显示 Northwind 商贸数据库中的数据 。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively use a control and a object bound to an HTTP cookie to display data from the Northwind Traders database in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.CookieParameter_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.CookieParameter_1/CS/cp1cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.CookieParameter_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.CookieParameter_1/VB/cp1vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式创建 对象，设置其属性，并将其添加到 控件的 集合中。The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically create a object, set its properties, and add it to a control's collection. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.CookieParameter_2#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.CookieParameter_2/CS/cookieparam2cs.aspx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.CookieParameter_2#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.CookieParameter_2/VB/cookieparam2vb.aspx.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `context`方法使用参数 检索 cookie 集合以及对象绑定到的 cookie 的值 。The `context` parameter is used by the method to retrieve the cookies collection and the value of the cookie that the object binds to. `control`忽略参数。The `control` parameter is ignored.
